r.s: SQL database XML definition tool for DDL creation and differencing
r.d:
Database definition tool for creation or upgrade of an existing database with a "SQL compiler" approach.
Database upgrade DDL/DML/DCL is generated from source XML, without connecting to the target database.
http://dbsteward.org/
r.n:
DBSteward 1.3.10 Release
Changes * psql8 inherited table static row definition bugfixes * mysql5 table partition support for extracton and diffing * mysql5 stored procedure extraction and diffing support
Supported Platform DDL Generation and Differencing: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mssql10 - Microsoft SQL Server 2008 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
Supported Platform Structure Extraction into XML: * pgsql8 - PostgreSQL 8 * mysql5 - MySQL 5
